00060 sub listLibraries {  # list the problem libraries that are available.
00061     my $self = shift;
00062     my $rh = shift;
00063     #my $my_ce = $self->{ce};
00064     my %libraries = %{$self->{ce}->{courseFiles}->{problibs}};
00065  
00066     my $templateDirectory = $self->{ce}->{courseDirs}{templates};
00067 
00068     foreach my $key (keys %libraries) {
00069         $libraries{$key} = "$templateDirectory/$key";
00070     }
00071     
00072     my @outListLib = sort keys %libraries;
00073     my $out = {};
00074     $out->{ra_out} = \@outListLib;
00075     $out->{text} = encode_base64("success");
00076     return $out;
00077 }

00079 use File::stat;
00080 sub readFile {
00081     my $self = shift;
00082     my $rh   = shift;
00083     local($|)=1;
00084     my $out = {};
00085     my $filePath = $rh->{filePath};
00086 
00087     my %libraries = %{$self->{ce}->{courseFiles}->{problibs}};
00088  
00089     my $templateDirectory = $self->{ce}->{courseDirs}{templates};
00090 
00091     foreach my $key (keys %libraries) {
00092         $libraries{$key} = "$templateDirectory/$key";
00093     }
00094     
00095 
00096     
00097     if (  defined($libraries{$rh->{library_name}} )   ) {
00098         $filePath = $libraries{$rh->{library_name}} .'/'. $filePath;
00099     } else {
00100         $out->{error} = "Could not find library:".$rh->{library_name}.":";
00101         return($out);
00102     }
00103     
00104     if (-r $filePath) {
00105         open IN, "<$filePath";
00106         local($/)=undef;
00107         my $text = <IN>;
00108         $out->{text}= encode_base64($text);
00109         my $sb=stat($filePath);
00110         $out->{size}=$sb->size;
00111         $out->{path}=$filePath;
00112         $out->{permissions}=$sb->mode&07777;
00113         $out->{modTime}=scalar localtime $sb->mtime;
00114         close(IN);
00115     } else {
00116         $out->{error} = "Could not read file at |$filePath|";
00117     }
00118     return($out);
00119 }

00121 use File::Find; 
00122 #idea from http://www.perlmonks.org/index.pl?node=How%20to%20map%20a%20directory%20tree%20to%20a%20perl%20hash%20tree
00123 sub build_tree {
00124     my $node = $_[0] = {};
00125     my @s;
00126     find({wanted=>sub {
00127       # fixed 'if' => 'while' -- thanks Rudif
00128       unless ($File::Find::dir =~/.svn/ || $File::Find::name =~/.svn/) {
00129         $node = (pop @s)->[1] while @s and $File::Find::dir ne $s[-1][0];
00130         return $node->{$_} = -s if -f;
00131         push @s, [ $File::Find::name, $node ];
00132         $node = $node->{$_} = {};
00133       }
00134     }, follow_fast=>1}, $_[1]);
00135     $_[0]{$_[1]} = delete $_[0]{'.'};
00136 }

00138 sub listLib {
00139     my $self = shift;
00140     my $rh = shift;
00141     my $out = {};
00142     my $dirPath = $self->{ce}->{courseDirs}{templates}."/".$rh->{library_name};
00143     my $maxdepth= $rh->{maxdepth};
00144     my $dirPath2 = $dirPath . ( ($rh->{dirPath}) ?  '/'.$rh->{dirPath}  : '' ) ;
00145     my @tare = $dirPath2=~m|/|g; 
00146     my $tare = @tare;     # counts number of "/" in dirPath prefix
00147     my @outListLib;
00148     my %libDirectoryList;
00149     my $depthfinder = sub {   # counts depth below the current directory
00150         my $path = shift;
00151         my @count = $path=~m|/|g;
00152         my $depth = @count;
00153         return $depth - $tare;
00154     };
00155     my $wanted = sub {  # find .pg files
00156         unless ($File::Find::dir =~/.svn/ ) {
00157             my $name = $File::Find::name;
00158             if ($name =~/\S/ ) {
00159                 #$name =~ s|^$dirPath2/*||;  # cut the first directory
00160                 push(@outListLib, "$name") if $name =~/\.pg/;
00161     
00162             }
00163         }
00164     };
00165     
00166     my $wanted_directory = sub {
00167         $File::Find::prune =1 if &$depthfinder($File::Find::dir) > $maxdepth;
00168         unless ($File::Find::dir =~/.svn/ ) {
00169             my $dir = $File::Find::dir;
00170             if ($dir =~/\S/ ) {
00171                 $dir =~ s|^$dirPath2/*||;  # cut the first directory
00172     
00173                 $libDirectoryList{$dir} = {};
00174             }
00175         }
00176     };
00177      
00178     my $command = $rh->{command};
00179     #warn "the command being executed is ' $command '";
00180     $command = 'all' unless defined($command);
00181     
00182         $command eq 'all' &&    do {
00183                                     $out->{command}="all -- list all pg files in $dirPath";
00184                                     find({wanted=>$wanted,follow_fast=>1 }, $dirPath);
00185                                     @outListLib = sort @outListLib;
00186                                     $out->{ra_out} = \@outListLib;
00187                                     $out->{text} = encode_base64( join("\n", @outListLib) );
00188                                     return($out);
00189         };
00190         $command eq 'dirOnly' &&   do {
00191                                     if ( -e $dirPath2) {
00192                                         find({wanted=>$wanted_directory,follow_fast=>1 }, $dirPath2);
00193                                         #@outListLib = grep {/\S/} sort keys %libDirectoryList; #omit blanks
00194                                         #foreach my $key (grep {/\S/} sort keys %libDirectoryList) {
00195                                         #   push @outListLib, "$key"; # number of subnodes
00196                                         #}
00197                                         delete $libDirectoryList{""};
00198                                         $out->{ra_out} = \%libDirectoryList;
00199                                         $out->{text} = encode_base64("Loaded libraries");
00200                                         return($out);
00201                                     } else {
00202                                        $out->{error} = "Can't open directory  $dirPath2";
00203                                     }
00204         };
00205 #            use File::Find::Rule;
00206             # find all the subdirectories of a given directory
00207 #               my @subdirs = File::Find::Rule->directory->in( $dirPath );
00208 #           $command eq 'dirOnly' && do {
00209 #               my @subdirs = File::Find::Rule->directory->in( ($dirPath) );
00210 #               $out->{ra_out} = \@subdirs;
00211 #               $out->{text} = encode_base64("Loaded libraries".$dirPath);
00212 #               return($out);           
00213 #           };
00214         $command eq 'buildtree' &&   do {
00215                                     #find({wanted=>$wanted_directory,follow_fast=>1 }, $dirPath);
00216                                     build_tree(my $tree, $dirPath);
00217                                     #@outListLib = sort keys %libDirectoryList;
00218                                     $out->{ra_out} = $tree;
00219                                     $out->{text} = encode_base64("Loaded libraries");
00220                                     return($out);
00221         };
00222         
00223         $command eq 'files' && do {  @outListLib=();
00224                                      #my $separator = ($dirPath =~m|/$|) ?'' : '/';
00225                                      #my $dirPath2 = $dirPath . $separator . $rh->{dirPath};
00226                                      if ( -e $dirPath2) {
00227                                          find($wanted, $dirPath2);
00228                                          @outListLib = sort @outListLib;
00229                                          #$out ->{text} = encode_base64( join("", @outListLib ) );
00230                                          $out ->{text} = encode_base64( "Problems loaded" );
00231                                          $out->{ra_out} = \@outListLib;
00232                                      } else {
00233                                        $out->{error} = "Can't open directory  $dirPath2";
00234                                      }
00235                                      return($out);
00236         
00237         };
00238         # else
00239     $out->{error}="Unrecognized command $command";
00240     return( $out );
00241 }

00243 sub searchLib {    #API for searching the NPL database
00244     my $self = shift;
00245     my $rh = shift;
00246     my $out = {};
00247     my $ce = $self->{ce};
00248     my $subcommand = $rh->{subcommand};
00249         'getDBTextbooks' eq $subcommand && do {
00250             $self->{library_subjects} = $rh->{library_subjects};
00251             $self->{library_chapters} = $rh->{library_chapters};
00252             $self->{library_sections} = $rh->{library_sections};
00253             $self->{library_textchapter} = $rh->{library_textchapter};
00254             my @textbooks = WeBWorK::Utils::ListingDB::getDBTextbooks($self);
00255             $out->{ra_out} = \@textbooks;
00256             return($out);       
00257         };
00258         'getAllDBsubjects' eq $subcommand && do {
00259             my @subjects = WeBWorK::Utils::ListingDB::getAllDBsubjects($self);
00260             $out->{ra_out} = \@subjects;
00261             $out->{text} = encode_base64("Subjects loaded.");
00262             return($out);       
00263         };
00264         'getAllDBchapters' eq $subcommand && do {
00265             $self->{library_subjects} = $rh->{library_subjects};
00266             my @chaps = WeBWorK::Utils::ListingDB::getAllDBchapters($self);
00267             $out->{ra_out} = \@chaps;
00268             return($out);       
00269         };
00270         'getDBListings' eq $subcommand && do {
00271             my $templateDir = $self->{ce}->{courseDirs}->{templates};
00272             $self->{library_subjects} = $rh->{library_subjects};
00273             $self->{library_chapters} = $rh->{library_chapters};
00274             $self->{library_sections} = $rh->{library_sections};
00275             $self->{library_keywords} = $rh->{library_keywords};
00276             $self->{library_textbook} = $rh->{library_textbook};
00277             $self->{library_textchapter} = $rh->{library_textchapter};
00278             $self->{library_textsection} = $rh->{library_textsection};
00279             my @listings = WeBWorK::Utils::ListingDB::getDBListings($self);
00280             my @output = map {$templateDir."/Library/".$_->{path}."/".$_->{filename}} @listings;
00281             #change the hard coding!!!....just saying
00282             $out->{ra_out} = \@output;
00283             return($out);
00284         };
00285         'getSectionListings' eq $subcommand && do {
00286             $self->{library_subjects} = $rh->{library_subjects};
00287             $self->{library_chapters} = $rh->{library_chapters};
00288             $self->{library_sections} = $rh->{library_sections};
00289 
00290             my @section_listings = WeBWorK::Utils::ListingDB::getAllDBsections($self);
00291             $out->{ra_out} = \@section_listings;
00292             return($out);
00293         };
00294     # else
00295     $out->{error}="Unrecognized command $subcommand";
00296     return( $out );
00297 }

00300 sub pretty_print_rh {
00301     my $rh = shift;
00302     my $out = "";
00303     my $type = ref($rh);
00304     if ( ref($rh) =~/HASH/ ) {
00305         foreach my $key (sort keys %{$rh})  {
00306             $out .= "  $key => " . pretty_print_rh( $rh->{$key} ) . "\n";
00307         }
00308     } elsif ( ref($rh) =~ /SCALAR/ ) {
00309         $out = "scalar reference ". ${$rh};
00310     } elsif ( ref($rh) =~/Base64/ ) {
00311         $out .= "base64 reference " .$$rh;
00312     } else {
00313         $out =  $rh;
00314     }
00315     if (defined($type) ) {
00316         $out .= "type = $type \n";
00317     }
00318     return $out;
00319 }
